# Aerobanana

This is a [Choco Banana](https://puzz.link/rules.html?cbanana) with the [Look-Air restriction](https://puzz.link/rules.html?lookair) that no two shaded rectangles that see each other can share any side lengths.

[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2025/aerobanana1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
